title: Sydney .NET User Group - April
sessionTitle: Twitter in the Courtroom, Defamation and Copyright Infringement on Social Media
eventDescription: ​Piper Alderman Partner Tom Griffith will explain how traditional laws of defamation apply on social media, and will discuss how Courts have adapted to widespread use of social media, including in the courtroom. The seminar will also cover Copyright and other intellectual property issues arising in social media.
